channel.title: TxT's Blog
channel.description: This is my little blog where I write about everything that comes to my mind.

item.title: My gaming PC is a VM
item.description: This blog post explains how I came to build a server running Proxmox for virtualizing my NAS and Gaming PC on a single physical machine

item.title: What I learned from running a public Minecraft server
item.description: I not only gained lots of technical knowledge when I ran a vanilla survival Minecraft server for multiple years!

item.title: Dukatia Version 0.20.1 Changelog
item.description: Version 0.20.1 is just a minor patch release containing a couple of fixes, mostly around UI problems in the frontend.
